name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Frontend360: Precision Made Easy for Developers and Designers

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Place horizontal and vertical lines, adjust their color, and fine-tune their positions to achieve perfect layout accuracy.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Frontend360 is a must-have tool for web developers and designers, offering a streamlined way to achieve pixel-perfect precision on any web page. 
Effortlessly add horizontal and vertical lines, customize their colors, and position them exactly where you need. 
With additional features like adjustable line gaps, color changes, quick positioning, and multiple guide options, our extension simplifies your workflow and enhances layout accuracy.
